snippet: Formula One racing has struggled to find a permanent home in the United States, but it is returning in two weeks after a five-year absence.
abstract: Formula One racing, which has struggled to find permanent home in United States, is returning after a five-year absence with race at Circuit of the Americas track in Austin, Texas.
lead_paragraph: Formula One racing has struggled to find a permanent home in the United States, but it is returning in two weeks after a five-year absence.

headline.seo: Landing Spot in America Is Elusive for Formula One
headline.main: Landing Spot in America Is Elusive for Formula One
headline.print_headline: Landing Spot in America Is Elusive for Formula One
